commit.message:
tree-alias-common.c (gate_pta): New function.

2004-08-26  Daniel Berlin  <dberlin@dberlin.org>

	* tree-alias-common.c (gate_pta): New function.
	(pass_build_pta): Use it.
	(pass_del_pta): Use it.
	(delete_alias_vars): Don't check flag_tree_points_to.

From-SVN: r86631

files.patch:
@@ -1,3 +1,10 @@
+2004-08-26  Daniel Berlin  <dberlin@dberlin.org>
+
+	* tree-alias-common.c (gate_pta): New function.
+	(pass_build_pta): Use it.
+	(pass_del_pta): Use it.
+	(delete_alias_vars): Don't check flag_tree_points_to.
+
